medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient reported being in his usual state of health until yesterday afternoon when he noticed vague central abdominal pain. The pain progressed in severity and settled in a band-like distribution across his umbilicus, with maximal discomfort in the suprapubic region, just to the right of midline. He endorsed mild nausea but denied emesis, fevers, chills, constipation, or diarrhea. There were no prior episodes.
